import Logo from '../logo.png' import Icon_User from '../Icons/Icon_User'; import Icon_Search from '../Icons/Icon_Search'; import Icon_Bag from '../Icons/Icon_Bag'; import Icon_Close from '../Icons/Icon_Close'; const { Component } = require("react"); class Header extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) } state = { searchActive: false } body = document.querySelector('body') overlay = document.querySelector('.body__overlay') openSearch = () => { overlay.classList.add('is_visible') body.style.overflowY = "hidden" this.setState({ searchActive : true }) } closeSearch = () => { overlay.classList.remove('is_visible') body.style.overflowY = "auto" this.setState({ searchActive : false }) } openCart = () => { this.props.toggleCart(true) } render() { return( <>
  • { Icon_User }
  • shop shop
  • Our Story Our Story
  • Happy Customers Happy Customers
  • Contact Us Contact Us
    • { Icon_Search }
    ) } } export default Header;
